Privacy Policy Title: Qexpo a new home for your preowned items.
Privacy Policy Desc:
Pickup is the responsibility of the acquiring party. Patrons are advised to please, take all necessary safety and security precautions during pickup. 

Pickup must be done within 7 days of acquisition, except as otherwise agreed with the donor. 

All items not picked up within the stipulated period or as otherwise agreed with the donor will be automatically re-listed. 

The  Qexpo Services are provided “as is” and “as available”, and by using these services, you agree not to hold us liable for things other users do.
